subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Basketball
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: A fourth-quarter rally led by LeBron James was required for American men’s basketball to fend off a hot-shooting team from Lithuania, which got 25 points from Linas Kleiza.
snippet: A fourth-quarter rally led by LeBron James was required for American men’s basketball to fend off a hot-shooting team from Lithuania, which got 25 points from Linas Kleiza.
